languages.text: {n}Вы пытаетесь повторять за Паскалем слова литании, но язык не слушается вас, а конвульсии, сотрясающие тело, мешают пальцам касаться нужных командных рун. Прежде, чем забытье поглотит вас, вам удается встать с трона и чудом удержаться на подкашивающихся ногах.{/n}

{n}You try to repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal, but you cannot control your tongue, and the convulsions that wrack your body prevent your fingers from touching the right command runes. Before oblivion has engulfed you completely, you manage to get up from the throne and just barely keep your unsteady footing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь повторять за Паскалем слова литании, но язык не слушается вас, а конвульсии, сотрясающие тело, мешают пальцам касаться нужных командных рун. Прежде, чем забытье поглотит вас, вам удается встать с трона и чудом удержаться на подкашивающихся ногах.{/n}

Before oblivion has engulfed you completely, you manage to get up from the throne and just barely keep your unsteady footing.{/n}

Before oblivion has engulfed you completely, you manage to get up from the throne and just barely keep your unsteady footing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst, Pasqal die Litanei nachzusprechen, doch du kannst deine Zunge nicht kontrollieren. Die Zuckungen, die deinen Körper schütteln, verhindern zudem, dass deine Finger die richtigen Befehlsrunen berühren. Bevor du vollkommen vom Nichts fortgerissen wirst, gelingt es dir mit letzter Kraft und zittrigen Beinen, vom Thron aufzustehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal, but you cannot control your tongue, and the convulsions that wrack your body prevent your fingers from touching the right command runes. Before oblivion has engulfed you completely, you manage to get up from the throne and just barely keep your unsteady footing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du versuchst, Pasqal die Litanei nachzusprechen, doch du kannst deine Zunge nicht kontrollieren. Die Zuckungen, die deinen Körper schütteln, verhindern zudem, dass deine Finger die richtigen Befehlsrunen berühren. Bevor du vollkommen vom Nichts fortgerissen wirst, gelingt es dir mit letzter Kraft und zittrigen Beinen, vom Thron aufzustehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous essayez de répéter les paroles de la litanie après Pasqal, mais votre langue ne vous obéit plus et les convulsions qui secouent votre corps empêchent vos doigts de toucher les runes de contrôle. Juste avant de sombrer dans les ténèbres, vous parvenez à vous lever du trône sans trop perdre l'équilibre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal, but you cannot control your tongue, and the convulsions that wrack your body prevent your fingers from touching the right command runes. Before oblivion has engulfed you completely, you manage to get up from the throne and just barely keep your unsteady footing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous essayez de répéter les paroles de la litanie après Pasqal, mais votre langue ne vous obéit plus et les convulsions qui secouent votre corps empêchent vos doigts de toucher les runes de contrôle. Juste avant de sombrer dans les ténèbres, vous parvenez à vous lever du trône sans trop perdre l'équilibre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试图跟随帕斯卡诵念祷文，但你的舌头完全不听使唤。你浑身上下抽搐不止，根本无法触摸到正确的命令符文。你赶在彻底失去意识之前，从宝座上站了起来，摇摇晃晃地往前走着，双脚勉强支撑着没有摔倒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal, but you cannot control your tongue, and the convulsions that wrack your body prevent your fingers from touching the right command runes. Before oblivion has engulfed you completely, you manage to get up from the throne and just barely keep your unsteady footing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试图跟随帕斯卡诵念祷文，但你的舌头完全不听使唤。你浑身上下抽搐不止，根本无法触摸到正确的命令符文。你赶在彻底失去意识之前，从宝座上站了起来，摇摇晃晃地往前走着，双脚勉强支撑着没有摔倒。{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルの後について連祷の言葉を繰り返そうとするものの、舌が回らず、体が痙攣して震え、コマンドルーンにうまく触れることができない。忘我にすっかり飲み込まれてしまう前になんとか王座から立ち上がり、不安定な足取りでかろうじて踏みとどまる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal, but you cannot control your tongue, and the convulsions that wrack your body prevent your fingers from touching the right command runes. Before oblivion has engulfed you completely, you manage to get up from the throne and just barely keep your unsteady footing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの後について連祷の言葉を繰り返そうとするものの、舌が回らず、痙攣して体が震え、コマンドルーンをうまく触れることができない。忘我にすっかり飲み込まれてしまう前に、なんとか王座から離れて、ふらつく足で立ち上がることができた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas repetir las palabras de la letanía después de Pasqal, pero no puedes controlar tu lengua, y las convulsiones que azotan tu cuerpo impiden que tus dedos toquen las runas de mando correctas. Antes de que el olvido te envuelva por completo, consigues levantarte del trono y mantenerte en pie a duras penas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal, but you cannot control your tongue, and the convulsions that wrack your body prevent your fingers from touching the right command runes. Before oblivion has engulfed you completely, you manage to get up from the throne and just barely keep your unsteady footing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas repetir las palabras de la letanía después de Pasqal, pero no puedes controlar tu lengua, y las convulsiones que sacuden tu cuerpo impiden que tus dedos toquen las runas de mando correctas. Antes de que el olvido te envuelva por completo, consigues levantarte del trono y mantenerte en pie a duras penas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın peşinden ilahinin sözlerini tekrar etmeye çalışıyorsun ancak diline bir türlü hâkim olamıyorsun. Vücudunu şiddetle sarsan kasılmalar, parmaklarının doğru komuta rünlerine ulaşmasına mâni oluyor. Hiçliğe gömülmeden önce tahttan kalkmayı başarıyor ancak zar zor ayakta duruyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to repeat the words of the litany after Pasqal, but you cannot control your tongue, and the convulsions that wrack your body prevent your fingers from touching the right command runes. Before oblivion has engulfed you completely, you manage to get up from the throne and just barely keep your unsteady footing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın peşinden ilahiyi söylemeye çalışıyorsun ancak diline bir türlü hâkim olamıyorsun. Vücudunu esir alan kasılmalar, parmaklarının doğru komuta rünlerine ulaşmasına mâni oluyor. Hiçliğe gömülmeden önce tahttan kalkmayı başarıyor ancak zar zor ayakta duruyorsun.{/n}
